mapper.select: SELECT RANK,CHOICE_NO, CHOICE_FREQ, CHOICE_REASON, CHOICE_CATEGORY, CHOICE_DATE, CHOICE_CODE, CHOICE_ID FROM (SELECT CHOICE_NO, CHOICE_FREQ, CHOICE_REASON, CHOICE_CATEGORY, CHOICE_DATE, CHOICE_CODE, CHOICE_ID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CHOICE_DATE DESC) rank FROM CHOICE) B WHERE CHOICE_CODE= #{no} AND ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3

SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_ALTERNATIVETITLE, MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE_ACTOR, MOVIE_CNT, MOVIE_DATE, MOVIE_IMG,B.rank FROM (SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_ALTERNATIVETITLE, MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE_ACTOR, MOVIE_CNT, MOVIE_DATE, MOVIE_IMG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MOVIE_CNT DESC) rank FROM MOVIE) B WHERE MOVIE_CODE=#{no}

SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_ALTERNATIVETITLE, MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE_ACTOR, MOVIE_CNT, MOVIE_DATE, MOVIE_IMG,B.RANK FROM (SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_ALTERNATIVETITLE, MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE_ACTOR, MOVIE_CNT, MOVIE_DATE, MOVIE_IMG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MOVIE_CNT DESC) RANK FROM MOVIE ) B WHERE RANK BETWEEN 1 AND 6

select * from (SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_ALTERNATIVETITLE, MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE_ACTOR, MOVIE_CNT, MOVIE_DATE, MOVIE_IMG,B.RANK FROM (SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_ALTERNATIVETITLE, MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE_ACTOR, MOVIE_CNT, MOVIE_DATE, MOVIE_IMG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MOVIE_CNT DESC) RANK FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_TITLE LIKE '%' || '' || '%' ) B) WHERE MOVIE_TITLE LIKE '%' || UPPER(TRIM(#{text})) || '%' AND RANK BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_ALTERNATIVETITLE, MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE_ACTOR, MOVIE_CNT, MOVIE_DATE, MOVIE_IMG,B.RANK FROM (SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_ALTERNATIVETITLE, MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE_ACTOR, MOVIE_CNT, MOVIE_DATE, MOVIE_IMG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MOVIE_CNT DESC) RANK FROM MOVIE) B WHERE RANK BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} AND B.MOVIE_GENRE LIKE '%' || UPPER(TRIM(#{text})) || '%'

SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_ALTERNATIVETITLE, MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE_ACTOR, MOVIE_CNT, MOVIE_DATE, MOVIE_IMG,B.RANK FROM (SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_ALTERNATIVETITLE, MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE_ACTOR, MOVIE_CNT, MOVIE_DATE, MOVIE_IMG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MOVIE_CNT DESC) RANK FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{text} || '%' ) B WHERE RANK BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{text} || '%'
SELECT NVL(sum(CHOICE.CHOICE_FREQ),0) CHOICE_FREQ ,count(CHOICE.CHOICE_FREQ) FROM MOVIE, CHOICE WHERE MOVIE.MOVIE_CODE = #{no} AND MOVIE.MOVIE_CODE =CHOICE.CHOICE_CODE
